attributes.action: Look into the collapse of Property Professionals + Ltd and the financial harships it has brought to their former students.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As published by the daily mirror on the 18.2.2010, property professionals + ltd went into administration leaving thousands of students part qualified and thousands of pounds out of pocket.
Barclays say they are looking for another training provider, but this coud be at another extra cost to the students. The students want their money back.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
